input_args.passage: 'John Wick - Wikipedia | John Wick is an American neo-noir action thriller media franchise created by Derek Kolstad and centered on John Wick, a former hitman who is drawn back into the criminal underworld he had previously abandoned., neo-noir action thriller'
input_args.claim: 'Therefore, it is clear that the genre associated with John Wick is "neo-noir action thriller".'
